original_text: And Joseph saw Ephraim's children of the third generation: the children also of Machir the son of Manasseh were brought up upon Joseph's knees.
korean_text: 에브라임의 자손 삼대를 보았으며 므낫세의 아들 마길의 아들들도 요셉의 슬하에서 양육되었더라

sentences.original_text: And Joseph saw Ephraim's children of the third generation
the children also of Machir the son of Manasseh
were brought up upon Joseph's knees
